overview: Bubbly, blonde Aubrey Addams has an instant appetite for women, and her job at a swanky lesbian hotel offers many opportunities for erotic mischief. But housemother Nina Hartley is aware of naughty Aubrey's ways, and is keeping an eye on the "little minx." What lies will Aubrey tell little Sinn Sage about lover Indigo Sweet? Can Satine Phoenix win back angry girlfriend Lindsey Meadows? And hot fat will Aubrey go to get a moment along with Nina's girlfriend Michelle Lay? Sweetheart Video breaks all the rules in this black and white "silent film" farce (with all sex scenes filmed in full color and sound.) Written and directed by Nica Noelle.
title: My Little Minx
